=-alignment.title: Padding for =
=-alignment.description: Pad left or right of the character

=-leftSpace.title: Left space for =
=-leftSpace.description: Add 1 whitespace to the left of the character

=-rightSpace.title: Right space for =
=-rightSpace.description: Add 1 whitespace to the right of the character

:-alignment.title: Padding for :
:-alignment.description: Pad left or right of the character

:-leftSpace.title: Left space for :
:-leftSpace.description: Add 1 whitespace to the left of the character

:-rightSpace.title: Right space for :
:-rightSpace.description: Add 1 whitespace to the right of the character

,-leftSpace.title: Left space for ,
,-leftSpace.description: Add 1 whitespace to the left of the character

,-rightSpace.title: Right space for ,
,-rightSpace.description: Add 1 whitespace to the right of the character

alignComments.title: Align comments
alignComments.description: Align trailing comments when aligning characters
